plays.text: Goal scored by Rob Niedermayer assisted by Blake Sloan and Denis Gauthier

Penalty to Steve Montador 2 minutes for Tripping Alex Tanguay

Penalty to Toni Lydman 2 minutes for Tripping Peter Forsberg
Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Peter Forsberg and Joe Sakic
Penalty to Dan Hinote 2 minutes for High Sticking Oleg Saprykin
Goal scored by Stephane Yelle unassisted
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Interference Oleg Saprykin
Penalty to Chris Drury 2 minutes for Holding Steve Reinprecht
